import React from 'react' import { contact, section5Title, social } from '../../profile' const Contact = () => { return (
<>

{section5Title}

{social.linkedin && } {social.github && }
{social.resume && }

{contact.phone} {contact.mail} {contact.city}

) } export default Contact
